heading: HB05112
0: AN ACT IMPOSING PENALTIES FOR FALSE TESTIMONY IN ANY CONGRESSIONAL HEARING UNDER ARTICLE 183 OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2017-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05112
FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPOSING PENALTIES FOR FALSE TESTIMONY IN ANY CONGRESSIONAL HEARING UNDER ARTICLE 183 OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE
ABSTRACT : Imposes The Penalty Of Prision Mayor In Its Minimum Period Upon Any Person, Who Knowingly Makes Untruthful Statements, Who Testifies Under Oath, Or Makes And Testifies Upon An Affidavit, Upon Any Material Matter, In Any Congressional Proceeding.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROQUE, HARRY L.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-22
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (080 2017-03-08)2. Violago (020 2017-09-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON REVISION OF LAWS ON 2017-02-28
